title: China likes to pay people to hold signs

replies.msg:
https://www.citynews1130.com/2020/01/21/burnaby-woman-paid-support-meng-wanzhou/

A lot of foreigners may not know, a lot of pro-government or support police rallies in Hong Kong are also paid to hold signs and chant slogans.
China did that in Hong Kong, Vancouver and elsewhere.
Do they really support China? Money talks......
